name: Kristopher Sandoval
title: Developer Relations Advocate
bio: Kristopher is a product marketing and developer relations leader with more than a decade of experience turning technical products into movements and fans into evangelists.
facts: ASc Network Admin, BSc Information Tech, MBA Management and Operations
Clasically trained musician and plays more than 30 instruments
Has written 750+ articles, books, whitepapers, and case studies to date
